name: single-spa-mfe-demo
description: Single-SPA micro-frontend demo with React, Vue, and Angular

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:packages && cd tests && npm install
scripts.install:packages: npm install --workspace=packages/shell-app && npm install --workspace=packages/react-mfe && npm install --workspace=packages/vue-mfe && npm install --workspace=packages/angular-mfe && npm install --workspace=packages/shared-library
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:react" "npm run dev:vue" "npm run dev:angular" "npm run dev:shell"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:react && npm run build:vue && npm run build:angular && npm run build:shell
scripts.test: npm run test --workspaces && npm run test:integration
scripts.deploy:shell: cd packages/shell-app && npm run build && vercel --prod
scripts.deploy:react: cd packages/react-mfe && npm run build && vercel --prod
scripts.deploy:vue: cd packages/vue-mfe && npm run build && vercel --prod
scripts.deploy:angular: cd packages/angular-mfe && npm run build && vercel --prod
scripts.deploy:shared: cd packages/shared-library && npm run build && vercel --prod
scripts.preview:all: concurrently "npm run preview:shared" "npm run preview:react" "npm run preview:vue" "npm run preview:angular" "npm run preview:shell"
scripts.sonar:status: powershell -Command "Invoke-WebRequest -Uri http://localhost:9001/api/system/status | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Content | ConvertFrom-Json | Format-List"

author: Your Name
